text: @senjudiciary @LindseyGrahamSC Why? Why??   Senate Republicans $1 trillion CORONAVIRUS RELIEF BILL which include $8 billion funding for military helicopters, aircraft, ships and missile defense systems, $11 billion to reimburse defense contractors, and $1.75 billion for new FBI headquarters in DC. Why?
